mapper.select: select user_pw from users where user_id=#{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_pw, user_email, user_phone_num, user_post_num, user_address, user_detail_address, user_name, user_nickname) values(#{user_id},#{user_pw},#{user_email},#{user_phone_num},#{user_post_num},#{user_address},#{user_detail_address},#{user_name},#{user_nickname})
